title: Rise Of The Triad: Dark War[PC][Win7 x86 x64]
description:
RISE OF THE TRIAD REPACK by GrizzlyB

 Rise of the Triad: Dark War (abbreviated as ROTT) is a first-person shooter video game that was first released in 1994 as shareware and developed by Apogee Software (formerly 3D Realms). 

Instructions:
Run SETUP.bat file.
 then run ROTT.bat.
 That is all

 DOSbox has been fully incorporated into the game. 

Tested on: 
Windows XP 32bit & 64bit 
 Windows 7 32bit & 64bit 


 Shouts to all the classic gamers out there. Fuck the new wave.
 If you like the software fucking buy it! <a href="
http://www.gog.com/gamecard/rise_of_the_triad__dark_war" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.gog.com/gamecard/rise_of_the_triad__dark_war</a>
